approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit requirements.
Reduce dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
approval_data.business_context: The V-KYC team currently relies on the IT data server team to provide recordings, which are stored on the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server. This process is manual and time-consuming.

requirements.description: A portal/dashboard should be created for accessing V-KYC recordings.
Access to the portal should be provided to V-KYC team leads and process managers.
All V-KYC recordings should be available on the portal.
Recordings should be searchable and accessible by date and month.
Recordings should be searchable by LAN ID.
Users should be able to upload a file (Excel or Text) with up to 50 LAN IDs for bulk download.
The system should process the file and trigger a backend API call.
Results of the bulk download should be displayed in a tabular format with a 'Download All' option.
The table should use pagination, displaying only 10 records at a time for both display and download.
The file upload should accept CSV/TXT file formats.
The recording download should start after clicking on the LAN ID.
Access to the screen should be limited to Team Leaders.

functional_requirements: Portal/Dashboard creation for accessing V-KYC recordings.
User access for V-KYC team leads and process managers.
Availability of all V-KYC recordings on the portal.
Search functionality by date, month, and LAN ID.
Bulk download functionality via file upload (Excel/Text) with up to 50 LAN IDs.
Backend API integration for processing file upload.
Tabular display of results with 'Download All' option.
Pagination for table display and download (10 records at a time).
Initiate recording download upon clicking LAN ID.
non_functional_requirements: Access to the screen should be limited to Team Leaders.
success_criteria: V-KYC team leads can easily access and download recordings.
Reduced dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
constraints: Recordings are stored on LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server.
File upload limit of 50 LAN IDs.
assumptions: The existing infrastructure (NFS server, etc.) will be accessible.
The backend API will be available to process the requests.
risks: Technical challenges in accessing and retrieving recordings from the NFS server.
Security risks related to access control.

recommendations: Specify the performance requirements (e.g., download speed).
Include details about error handling and logging.

identified_gaps: Missing details on error handling and logging.
recommendations_for_completion: Define user authentication and authorization mechanisms.
Specify expected download speeds and response times.
Detail the error handling and logging strategy.
